nodes.text: The Imperial Space Force was the military of the New Galactic Empire. It was created by the Jedi, the loyal bodyguard of the Galactic Emperor, and expanded the Empire from the celestial equator to the Great Rift. When the Knights of the Sith seized control of the Empire, they also took control of its military.

The Imperial Space Force is called the Imperial Navy in the finished films and Expanded Universe. The creation of the galaxy's principal military force, the Grand Army of the Republic, by the Jedi and its usurpation by the Sith occurs in Episode II and Episode III.
